types.name: personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: restricted
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use by adults 18+

types.name: premium
types.description: Fireworks intended for use in shows by professionals

types.name: Low yield
types.description: Explosives with low yield intended for small, controlled demolition

types.name: High yield
types.description: Explosives with high yield intended for less deliberate demolition

types.name: Blasting yield
types.description: Explosives with very high yield that are intended for use in rock blasting and more
